snippet: Yahoo has acquired Polyvore, a social shopping site that lets users pick and share clothing ensembles — and purchase all items shown.
abstract: Yahoo announces agreement to buy social shopping site Polyvore for undisclosed price.

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and MIKE ISAAC

lead_paragraph: Yahoo has acquired Polyvore, a social shopping site that lets users pick and share clothing ensembles — and purchase all items shown.

headline.main: Yahoo Buys Polyvore, a Site Focused on Shopping
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Buys Social Media Site Focused on Shopping
